message: Let's start fair, I'll take the bigger share this time.  But we can work out something more even in the future if you accept this.
I think a more even split is fairer.  Let's be reasonable and work together.
Let's meet in the middle this time.  I'm willing to give up some of my share to be fair, but I won't go lower.  If we can't agree, the inflation will hurt us both.
